extendedInfo.description: Discover personalized event and content recommendations for your Jewish life, your way. Similar to Pandora and Netflix, GrapeVine is a recommendation engine - your lifelong, personal virtual concierge that suggests Jewish opportunities (people, events, articles, content) that you might like based on your interests, friends, life stage, and location. Use GrapeVine to choose your own Jewish adventure. GrapeVine is adaptive and customizable, allowing you to simply navigate your Jewish journey as you evolve, move, and change.GrapeVineâs mobile app introduces a number of powerful new tools and features to enchance your ability to find the right opportunities for you. Now fully integrated with Facebook, you can easily identify what your friends are doing.  With one touch, you can bookmark or register for opportunities, save them to your calender and share them with your friends. GrapeVine also provides you with an easy way to quickly provide feedback on opportunities youâve selected.This mobile app was made possible through the generous support of the Jewish Community Relations Council of New York, the Charles and Lynn Schusterman Family Foundation in partnership with the ROI Community, the Natan Fund, the UJA-Federation of New York and the Ryzman Family Foundation.

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: The app isn\'t the prettiest but it effectively does what it describes. I like it!
reviews.author: Adam Lewkovitz

reviews.title: Great idea! So glad someone came up with this!
reviews.comment: Not only is this a great idea - something very needed in the Jewish community - but this app does it really well. It gives me the ability to search for events in all different ways. Really great!
reviews.author: Deborah Ben-Moshe

reviews.title: Great feature set and orgs
reviews.comment: New to the city and tried to search for an app that would allow me to visit Jewish event without too much work. Found this gem from a friend and attended an event that I would never have found, so it was definitely worth it esp being free!
reviews.author: william Simpson

reviews.title: Crashes constantly. Almost zero events.
reviews.comment: Crashes every few clicks and doesn\'t have events outside New York City. Barely any in NYC.
reviews.author: Sarah Horn

reviews.title: Warning: spammers!
reviews.comment: They take your email and spam you!!
reviews.author: David Michaelson

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: Grapevine is a great app for finding what is going on. I\'m looking forward to seeing what it comes up with!  Real easy to use.
reviews.author: Evan Chesir

reviews.title: Shame on UJA for promoting JStreet
reviews.comment: I\'m very upset to see the UJA promotion of JStreet..
reviews.author: Brian Wartensky
